title: Knock-knock Steam-Rip READNFO MULTi4-RG SteamWorks

Knock-knock Steam-Rip READNFO MULTi4-RG SteamWorks


Information:


Release Date : October 4, 2013
Genre : Indie
Developer : Ice-pick Lodge
Publisher : Ice-pick Lodge
Platform : PC Publication 
Type : License [Steam-Rip]
Language : Russian, English, German, Polish
Sound language : Russian, English
Tablet : Enclosing (Reloaded Emu)


Description:


In the depths of a dense forest is an unusual house. Three generations of Inhabitants and he served as a laboratory and habitation. More recently, 
the last tenant began to notice startling changes in familiar surroundings 
things disappear, heard the noise and clicks. From the forest is something incomprehensible


System Requirements:


OS: Windows XP or later 
Processor: Intel Dual core or better
Memory: 1 GB Ram
Graphics: GPU that supports shader model 2.0 
Directx: 9.C
Hard Drive: 700 MB available space


READNFO:


Well Folks I do not give these type of small indie games but by the look of it,

it got me man, amazing game-play and great graphics, well I would say its a really

a smart game, it sharpen up your mind and open the thoughts, well if you have not 

tried it so here is your chance, exclusive from steam and in 4 language and just 

at one click, so here it is Knock-knock enjoy.


Install and Play!
